00026     public MainTableModel(AbstractController controller) {
00027         provider = new ScheatorDb.Matches();
00028         this.controller = controller;
00029         controller.addModel(this);
00030         list = provider.getList();
00031         org.jdesktop.application.ResourceMap resourceMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getResourceMap(MainTableModel.class);
00032         //javax.swing.ActionMap actionMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getActionMap(MainTableModel.class, this);
00033 
00034         columns[0] = resourceMap.getString("ColRound.text");
00035         columns[1] = resourceMap.getString("ColHome.text");
00036         columns[2] = resourceMap.getString("ColAway.text");
00037 
00038     }

00044     public int getRowCount() {
00045         if (list != null && list.size() > 0)
00046             return list.size();
00047         else {
00048             return 1;
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00056     public int getColumnCount() {
00057         return columns.length;
00058     }
00059 
00065     @Override
00066     public String getColumnName(int columnIndex) {
00067         return columns[columnIndex];
00068     }
00069     
00070     public Object getValueAt(int row, int column) {
00071         Matches.Data retval = null;
00072         int i = 0;
00073         for(Iterator it=list.values().iterator(); it.hasNext();) {
00074             if (i == row) {
00075                 Matches.Data dbRow = (Matches.Data) it.next();
00076                 switch(column) {
00077                     case 0:
00078                         return dbRow.get("matchNumber");
00079                     case 1:
00080                         return dbRow.get("homeTeam");
00081                     case 2:
00082                         return dbRow.get("awayTeam");
00083                 }
00084                 break;
00085             }
00086             i++;
00087         }
00088         return retval;
00089     }

00135     public void update(int seasonId) {
00136         System.err.println("Updating table for season #" + seasonId);
00137         provider.fetch(seasonId);
00138         fireTableDataChanged();
